short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Augnito mic web extension to allow MIC turn on/off using Philips mic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Augnito mic web extension to allow MIC turn on/off using Philips mic. It lets the radiologists/clinicians easily control the Philips mic actions like turn mic on/off using Philips mic record button.

The extension works with any RIS/PACS web based application which has embedded Augnito Voice Services as VR solution.
